entry.title: Poppy Purse Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Purses
Price: 7.50

This felted wool purses is inspired by true north, wild and free. From our mighty Moose to Beaver, northern lights to wind swept Pines. Our northern collection are carefully crafted to create lasting impressions. Interior is cotton lined and closes with high quality lead-free ykk zipper. Perfect to organize jewelry, ear phones, business cards, keys, cosmetic items and change money. 

    size: 16.5cm L x 13.5cm Ht.

    composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
    care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
    Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

     

    Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: Thread Purse
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Purses
Price: 7.00

These purses is handmade from 100% wool, using only soap and warm water. The simple and clean heart design on the front has been carefully needle felted and closes with a zipper fastener, to keep any valuables snug and secure.

  • Comes Assortments of 4 colours
  • Interior cotton lining
  • Azo free dyes

size: 4” X 7”
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

 

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
